name: Mylee Ejercito
text: If everyone felt the same way, I'd be much less worried. But i agree that your other concerns are valid and we must be on our guard against those as well.    This could be the lever that shakes people out of their complacency and galvanizes people to action against all those things.

source_obj.text: If everyone felt the same way, I'd be much less worried. But i agree that your other concerns are valid and we must be on our guard against those as well.
